file_content.text: Hey, look, everyone! The Eternal Champion! Get an autograph. Get two! Only a thousand each!
Oh, good. Get back in there and die already.
Never thought I'd say it, but you've got a real chance at the title! Either way, I'll be so rich--but that's not the point! Give that crowd the show they deserve!
Keep this up, you'll be face-to-face with the Eternal Champion before you know it! Good for me, probably bad for you.
Hey! My new star's back. Get in there and show them what you've got!
Wonderful, another one. In answer to your most likely questions.... No, I do not sell seats. No, I do not grant autographs. And no, I absolutely will not make a wager with you.
I want to fight in the arena. Who do I talk to?
Why would I want your autograph?
Is there anything you actually do around here?
I suppose to you the sun is a useless ball of flame. Yes, just sitting there, doing nothing--except providing light and heat and nourishment to entire worlds.
I am Dominaire. I'm the reason the Arena Grand has ever been--and continues to be--the greatest source of entertainment in all the Eternal Empire.
How did you manage that?
I'm impressed.
You seem awfully pleased with yourself.
You'd be proud, too, if you ever accomplished anything great in your life.
Now excuse me. I have to find a last-instant replacement to die horribly at the hands of the Eternal Empire's most lethal--Oh, maybe--No. No, never mind.
[Call his bluff] All right, goodbye.
You want me to be fodder for your arena.
If you have no real plans for the rest of your life, signing up would be a great, last financial gesture to any next of kin.
What do you say? Interested?
I'll fight, but I won't die.
Oh, you're one of those. The scrappy dreamer who hopes to rise up from obscurity to become Eternal Champion! That scenario's a fantasy for a reason.
Come to think of it, been a while since I billed anyone as--Oh, and I know, I'll call you the Mysterious Stranger.
Mysterious Stranger. I like it.
How about "Battlemaster"?
I have a name. It's <FirstName>.
No, no, that's no good. Mysterious Stranger--the crowds will eat it up.
Fight time's almost here. You're slated to go up against the Master of Killers. If you need to say goodbye to anyone, make it quick and get on in there.
I can't fight yet. Be right back.
I'm ready now.
That's the spirit! I need this to look like a real fight, so try to stay alive a little while.
How could anyone know about Mayhem at the Arena Grand and not its architect? I mean--people today! Me--you talk to me.
Playing coy? I kind of like that. All right then, I'll play along.
Sign me up.
Drive. Hard work. Intellect. Charisma. Possibly some underwriting from my parents, but I don't like to talk about it.
As well you should be. I've arranged more legendary bouts than--Well, no one comes anywhere close enough to garner a mention.
You're awfully eager to die, stranger. Unless--unless you truly believe you have the infinite endurance and lightspeed reflexes to make it in the arena.
What kind of opponents would I be facing?
How wealthy and famous?
Wait! Wait, please. You look like you've been in a dust-up or two in your time. Would you be interested in possibly becoming wealthy and famous?
[Refuse Quest] No, I would not.
I'm already Grand Champion of the Great Hunt.
Pal, I'm already wealthy and famous.
Then I've wasted my time. I'll go looking elsewhere.
"Grand Champion"? You'd settle for "grand" when you could be Eternal Champion? I don't understand some--look, this is a level of glory you can't pass up. What do you say?
[Refuse Quest] I say "pass."
[Refuse Quest] Not in the least.
Want me to fight for you? I'll do it--and I'll win.
Only the most fascinating, frightening and devastating combatants and creatures from all across the galaxy! A who's-who of deadly mayhem, all the way up to the Eternal Champion.
Soon as you're ready, haul on into the arena. And try not to die right away.
You haven't even breathed on extravagant success until you've at least attempted to claim the title of Eternal Champion! Of course, if you fail, you're dead, but you die a legend! What do you say?
If you make it all the way, you'll be named Eternal Champion, with all the renown the title implies. But it won't make you literally immortal, so we're clear. What do you say?
Yes. I'm in.
Wonderful news! Perfect! Seems you're all set on the weapons front--all we need is a hook. Something to get the crowd excited!
I've got it. You're an unknown. A nameless wanderer from a faraway place. You will be the Mysterious Stranger!
How about "The Red Blade"?
How about "Barsen'thor"?
How about "Grand Champion"?
How about "Major Havoc"?
How about "Darth Occlus"?
How about "Lord Wrath"?
How about "Crackerjack"?
We had a Battlemaster just last week. Lost his head in record time, so Mysterious Stranger it is.
Oh, that sounds--That's actually pretty good. I'm going to save that one for someone more.... Mysterious Stranger--trust me, it suits you.
How about "Darth Nox"?
How about "Darth Imperius"?
Wonderful! Then we're in agreement!
We already have an Eternal Champion, and the arena's got "grand" in its name.... Mysterious Stranger. Less confusing. They'll love it!
How about "Dark Lord of the Sith"?
I'm not worried about my chances.
You make it sound incredibly dangerous. What will I be facing in there?
Perfect. Sign me up, already!
Sounds like something I'd like a shot at. I'm in.
[Refuse Quest] Not for me. I'll pass.
[Refuse Quest] On second thought, I have other things to do....
That will be me--the Eternal Champion.
Now understand, it doesn't grant you actual immortality. It's just a title. One you probably won't--Well, that's all beside the point.
Okay! I get it! You're in.
What we need now is a name--a name that tells a story. Something to get the crowd excited about you....
